#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#define EMPTY 2147483647

using namespace std;
int m, n;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int i,j,moves;
    int *tmp;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>m>>n;
        int park[m+1][n+1];


        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {

            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            {
                park[m][j]=EMPTY;
                cin>>park[i][j];
            }
            park[i][n]=EMPTY;

        }


        moves=0;
        int x=0;int y=0;
        while(park[x][y]!=EMPTY)
        {
            if(park[x][y+1]>park[x+1][y])x++;
            else y++;

            moves++;
        }
        cout<<(moves-1)<<endl;

    }

}
